summary: Game/app with an install button UI and multiple games/levels; user requests a permanent heart-shaped install button and fixes to level functionality and progression rules.
architectural_notes: Level progression should be gated so a level only unlocks after completing the previous level, respecting win/loss rules.
known_issues: Some game levels do not work properly.
Some levels unlock/open before completing the previous level.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add an install button with a heart shape and keep it permanently visible (not temporary).
Verify and fix all game levels: resolve broken levels, enforce correct level unlock order (no skipping), and ensure win/loss rules work smoothly across all levels.
